name: Arime
body: # arime arithmetic library Using Strings to do Math - a project to mess with - not expecting to be a serious or game changing library - learning how a library could be built - incomplete ## Proof of Concept [jsfiddle](//jsfiddle.net/ninbryan/9xq42c9a/30/embedded/result/)
